## ChatHeadless.addListener() method

Adds a listener for a specific state value of type T.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addListener<T>(listener: StateListener<T>): Unsubscribe;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listener | [StateListener](./chat-headless.statelistener.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The state listener to add |

**Returns:**

Unsubscribe

The function for removing the added listener
